snippet.title: The Legend of Nayuta: Boundless Trails - Teaser Trailer (Nintendo Switch, PS4, PC)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ thelegendofnayuta.com

Discover adventures beyond the horizon in The Legend of Nayuta: Boundless Trails! After a fateful encounter with a fairy named Noi, Nayuta and his friends find themselves whisked away on an adventure through multiple worlds in order to stop an evil plot that has been set in motion.

#NihonFalcom #LegendofNayuta
